translations: v.驾驶汽车（motor 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 直流电动机；直流马达；直羚动机
感应电动机；异步电动机
电动机控制；[电]马达控制
异步电动机，异步马达；感应电动机
直线电机；线性电动机；线型马达
福特汽车（美国汽车公司）
马达系统；运动系统；动力系统

sentences.sentence: They're planning a motoring holiday to France this year.
sentences.translation: 他们计划今年驾车到法国去度假。

sentences.sentence: Soon, members of the Royal family and other wealthy people took up motoring as a sport.
sentences.translation: 很快，皇室成员和其他富人开始把开车当作一项运动。

sentences.sentence: Finally, the motoring organizations have issued a warning to drivers following the recent falls of snow in many parts of the country.
sentences.translation: 最后，由于最近全国许多地区下雪，机动车协会向司机发出了警告。
